#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
bool a[10000001];int s[10000001];
#define M 10007
int pow(int a,int b)
{
    int ans=1,y=a;
    while(b!=0)
    {
               if(b%2)ans=(ans*y)%M;
               b=b/2;
               y=(y*y)%M;
    }
    return ans;
}
int main()
{
    int i,n,j;
    a[1]=1;
    for(i=2;i<=sqrt(10000000);i++)
    {
         if(!a[i])
         {
                  j=i*i;
                  while(j<=10000000){a[j]=1;j+=i;}
         }
    }
    for(i=1;i<=10000000;i++)
    {
                            if(!a[i])s[i]=s[i-1]+1;
                            else s[i]=s[i-1];
    }
    while(cin>>n)
    {
                 if(n==1)cout<<"0"<<endl;
                 else cout<<(pow(2,s[n]-1))%M<<endl;
    }
}
